name: set_flag
description: Set the flag status of a enhancement process.

process_id.description: The unique identifier of the process to optimize.

flagged.description: The new flag status of the process.

name: disable_feature
description: Temporarily disable specified feature of the PhotosyntheticEnhancer.

feature_id.description: The ID of the features to disable.

name: list_features
description: List all currently features of the PhotosyntheticEnhancer.
